options.title:
-p
    string
options.description:
Specifies a command prompt. This may be toggled on and off with the
      P command.

options.title: -s
options.description:
Suppress diagnostics. This should be used if ed
      standard input is from a script.

options.title:

options.description:
The nth previous line, where n
